# ion-x-timeline-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                     | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If `true`, the timeline item will be grayed out and "disabled". | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot    | Description                                                 |
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
|         | Content is placed in the primary area of the timeline item. |
| `"dot"` | Content is placed in the dot area of the timeline.          |


## Shadow Parts

| Part        | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| `"divider"` |             |
| `"dot"`     |             |
